predicate.note: Frames file for 'burble' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` For a woman whose period [*T*-487] is late , [*] using RU-486 means no waiting , no walking past picket lines at abortion clinics , and no feet up in stirrups for surgery , '' burbles [*T*-1] health writer Laura Fraser .
example.arg: [*T*-1] -> For a woman whose period [*T*-487] is late , [*] using RU-486 means no waiting , no walking past picket lines at abortion clinics , and no feet up in stirrups for surgery
